experiment.Type: Synthesizing perovskite quantum dots and characterizing by fluorescence spectroscopy

Procedure.Step: Retrieve the rack from the sample rack station.
Use the solid station to add 0.0224 g CH3NH3Br.
Use the solid station to add 0.0367 g PdBr2.
Use the solid station to add 0.7 g polyvinyl alcohol.
Use the liquid station to add 10 g deionized water.
Use the magnetic stirring station to stir the mixture at 800 rpm for 2 hours at 95 â„ƒ.
Use the centrifuge station to centrifuge at 5000 rpm for 5 minutes.
Use the sample preparation station to make the sample of PQD.
Use the fluorescence spectroscopy station to test the fluorescence emission spectra of the sample.
Place the rack into the sample rack station.
